title: Vendetta - 1995 (TV version) - Stefan auk as Carl Hamilton
description:
Since I have had standing ovations regarding my prior Hamilton and Beck rips, I have decided to brig you another one:

VENDETTA - 1995 - TV-version

It\\\&#039;s a two file rip pt.1-4 in the first and part 5-6 in the second, total size about 1.4G.

The seed will be very slow, at least to start, since I have limited bandwidth and I\\\&#039;m seeding other stuff at the same time (I have to keep my ratio up).

Quality is fair (I\\\&#039;m sure getting better at this), this is a rip of a copy of a used VHS registered from Swedish Television in 1995.
Further, I\\\&#039;m in the US trying to use a PAL VCR - I also have big issues with ripping (I have no clue what I\\\\\\\&#039;m doing). Anyway, here it is...


plot:
Two Swedish business men are kidnapped in Rome by the Mob, and moved to Sicily. Carl Hamilton is sent to Sicily on direct order from the Swedish Government. He is sent to negotiate for their release. Hamiltons partner and best friend, Lundwall, is murdered by the Mob. Hamilton is dragged into a bitter and brutal vendetta between himself and the Mob-leader Don Tommaso.

comment:
Stefan Sauk plays the Swedish equivalent of James Bond(kind of at least) in this action thriller involving the Sicilian maffia in the Hamilton saga.I think Sauk is the best Carl Hamilton ever.He brings so much power and intensity to this role.Stellan SkarsgÃƒÆ’?ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¥rd was ok as Hamilton,didnt have sense for Stormare or Peter Haber and noone of these come close to Sauk\\\&#039;s interpretation.Sauk shows both guts and wit in this solid thriller.The supporting ensemble cast gotta be some of Italy\\\&#039;s finest actors.A nice way to spend October afternoon.
